page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
{OFF-GROUND TOUCH Someone is chosen to be 'IT'. Then we decide which places are safe. Safe places might include a wall, steps, a fence or a bench. If you are in one of these places you cannot be caught. The person who is 'IT' has to try and catch another person. If someone is caught, he becomes 'IT'.
{ORANGE BALLS We make a circle. Then we skip round, singing the song Orange balls. At the end of it we sit down and the last person to sit down goes out of the circle. We choose a person that we think they love, and sing a song while the first person goes back in the middle. If he or she does love the person we chose, he has to clap and if he does not love the person he has to stamp his feet.
